content: Does this track have a github with example artifacts and are there endpoints available to develop against?
@Michael van der Zel Part of the content is served here https://hl7-eu.github.io/gravitate-health/

This helps. Is there also a test server were the artifacts "exist"?
And are the examples complete with respect to the scenarios here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120095544
I'll let @Craig Anderson answer that part
@Michael van der Zel , yes there will be two. One for the patient information leaflet and one for the IPS based on our Maria Persona. Currently working to get the test data uploaded to the servers.
@Craig Anderson Would be great if you let us know when that content is available, so we can check it out?
Certainly. We’ll make a post as soon as we get the samples in there.
And a practical question: when exactly will the track take place? I would like to join if possible to represent UNICOM (WP1)..
Hi @Esther Peelen , we had the kick off this morning (it was recorded if you missed it) and we have sessions Tuesday and Wednesday

Is it possible to get access to the slide deck. The recording usually takes a while to be posted. When I checked last week, I didn't see a session at 9am today but that is apparently when the session happened. I had downloaded the 11am meeting but that one apparently was cancelled.

Joan Harper said:

Is it possible to get access to the slide deck. The recording usually takes a while to be posted. When I checked last week, I didn't see a session at 9am today but that is apparently when the session happened. I had downloaded the 11am meeting but that one apparently was cancelled.

Hi @Joan Harper ,
I see Jens shared a link to our IG. I just updated the track page with links to the IPS IG, EMAs specification and embedded a copy of the track kick off presentation.

https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120095544

Michael van der Zel said:

Craig Anderson Would be great if you let us know when that content is available, so we can check it out?

Hi @Michael van der Zel ,

We updated our track page to include links the IGs for the IPS and ePI; link to EMAs ePI API specification and an embedded copy of our track kick off presentation. Recording is in WHOVA.

The ePI IG has sample data. We’re still working to sort out some bugs in the XML sample ePIs (validation feedback from EMA) but feel to have a look and let us know your feedback.

link to track page
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120095544
I see that a new server has been added in the track (Datapharm); what do you plan to test in this track ?
Its a replica of the ePI as I recall
@Giorgio Cangioli , confirmed with @Philippe Michiels that they have done a partial load of leaflets with the MAN EMEA/H/C/00142.

Giorgio Cangioli said:

I see that a new server has been added in the track (Datapharm); what do you plan to test in this track ?

Where can we find the server info for some PL docs? Thanks!

Jay Gustafson said:

Giorgio Cangioli said:

I see that a new server has been added in the track (Datapharm); what do you plan to test in this track ?

Where can we find the server info for some PL docs? Thanks!

http://conman.clinfhir.com/connectathon.html?event=con28 > Vulcan/Gravitate Health - Electronic Product > Servers tab
